basic.description:
This course offers two of the sections from the four media areas available at this level: painting, drawing, print media and sculpture. Course content builds on concepts developed in ARTF127/6.0 and ARTF128/6.0. New techniques, skills and concepts are introduced.
NOTE    Open only to students in a BFA Program.
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Intermediate Fine Art II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
NOTE  Open only to ARTF and ARTV students.
Prerequisite    A minimum grade of C- in  ARTF227 and a GPA of 1.60.
